Nehemiah or 2 Esdras__09.7__The fire of the Chaldeans: The city of Ur in Chaldea, the name of which signifies fire. Or out of the fire of the tribulations and temptations, to which he was there exposed.-- The ancient Rabbins understood this literally, affirming that Abram was cast into the fire by the idolaters, and brought out by a miracle without any hurt.
Nehemiah or 2 Esdras__09.17__And gave the head: That is, they set their head, or were bent to return to Egypt.
